localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Podpage makes it easy to create a podcast website with just a few clicks. Every page is optimized to be found on Google and stays up-to-date forever. No technical knowledge necessary.
blogPost.body: Podpage makes it easy to create a podcast website with just a few clicks. Every page is optimized to be found on Google and stays up-to-date forever. No technical knowledge necessary.
blogPost.title: Podpage - Build a podcast website in less than 5 minutes.
blogPost.author: Brenden Mulligan

localize.description: Podpage使得只需点击几下即可轻松创建播客网站。每个页面都经过优化，可以在Google上找到，并且永远保持最新。不需要技术知识。
localize.tagline: 在不到5分钟的时间内建成一个播客网站。

localize.description: Podpage使得只需點擊幾下即可輕鬆創建播客網站。每個頁面都經過優化，可以在Google上找到，並且永遠保持最新。不需要技術知識。
localize.tagline: 在不到5分鐘的時間內建成一個播客網站。

next.excerpt: Planetary is a social media app built upon the idea of protocols not platforms. Users and creators own their identities and social relationships. Privacy is respected and creators supported. Abuse and harassment is handled through community governance.
next.title: Planetary - Decentralized social media by and for the people.

localize.description: Planetary是一个建立在协议而非平台理念上的社交媒体应用。用户和创作者拥有自己的身份和社交关系。隐私得到尊重，创作者得到支持。滥用和骚扰通过社区治理来处理。
localize.tagline: 分散化的社交媒体由人民主导并为人民服务。

localize.description: Planetary是一個建立在協議而非平臺理念上的社交媒體應用。用戶和創作者擁有自己的身份和社交關係。隱私得到尊重，創作者得到支持。濫用和騷擾通過社區治理來處理。
localize.tagline: 分散化的社交媒體由人民主導併爲人民服務。
